channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Meet Luana Lopes Lara: The 29-year-old ballerina spent summers working for Ray Dalio—now she’s the youngest female self-made billionaire
item.description: Following in the footsteps of Taylor Swift and Scale AI's Lucy Guo, Luana Lopes Lara has just been crowned the world's youngest female self-made billi...

item.title: ‘I don’t know how people are going to live’: ACA enrollees brace for massive premium hikes as subsidies expire
item.description: “I don’t know how people are going to live, with it already being a struggle just to pay for food and all the other things,” Patricia Roberts, 52, sai...

item.title: Australia wants to end the era of kids on social media with international ban hailed as ‘first domino’ in global movement
item.description: If Meta, Google, and others can't figure out how to block accounts of users under 16 years old, they'll be fined $33 million per breach.

item.title: A year after the killing of UnitedHealthcare’s CEO, Luigi Mangione fights to suppress key evidence
item.description: Officers played footage of them catching Mangione, trying to play it cool by chatting about his steak sandwich.

item.title: Yasser Abu Shabab, Militant Leader Backed by Israel, Is Killed in Gaza, Official Says
item.description: Yasser Abu Shabab, a Bedouin man in his 30s, was at the center of an Israeli project in Gaza to build up anti-Hamas militias.

item.title: Inside RFK Jr.’s Methodical Quest to Shake Up America’s Vaccine System
item.description: The health secretary has walled himself off from government scientists and empowered fellow activists to pursue his vaccine agenda.

item.title: Putin Must Have Authorized Novichok Poisoning in Salisbury, UK Inquiry Finds
item.description: The death of a British woman from Novichok was the result of a botched assassination attempt on a former Russian spy, an official report said on Thurs...

item.title: The Diplomat Who Was Accused of Sexual Abuse but Kept His Job
item.description: President William Ruto faces pressure after a Times investigation showed that his government downplayed or ignored the mistreatment of women working i...

item.title: Steve Cropper, legendary guitarist on Memphis classics from ‘Green Onions’ to ‘In the Midnight Hour,’ dies at 84
item.description: Comedy fans know him as a key part of the Blues Brothers band, but almost everyone knows his understated style from dozens of soul classics.

item.title: What to Know About Putin’s Visit to India as Oil Trade Dries Up
item.description: The Trump administration, which crippled Russia’s oil sales to India with sanctions, will be watching Mr. Putin’s talks with Prime Minister Narendra M...

item.title: Ruined Rice Fields and Broken Rail Lines: Sri Lanka Counts Cost of Cyclone
item.description: Officials estimate the damage runs into billions of dollars, a headache for the island nation just recovering from an economic crash.
